name: Pseudo Summon
description:
This was made in three days for the Indie Tales summer Game Jam.

You play as a Wayward Spirit locked in a vicious battle with a thoroughly disgruntled wizard! Engage in a hectic bullet-hell boss battle to secure your resurrection!

Let it be known that performance can be rough on certain machines! Optimization may be done in the future, and a graphics menu will likely be implemented following the Jam's conclusion!
